name: Witchvania
description:
Witchvania: a game prototype created in 1 month in Godot engine.

The witch's sprite was made by Elthen (https://www.patreon.com/elthen), while all the other assets were made by me.

The main objective of the game is to pass all the 7 stages, beating 4 bosses in order to achieve this goal while using only a basic attack: manaball.

arows - move around;

spacebar - attack.
